title: Miami-Inspired Great Ocean Road Boutique Retreat with Daily Breakfast Hamper & A$50 Dining & Spa Credits
description: Revitalised with a desert-inspired palette and buttercup umbrellas framing a mineral pool, the brand-new Sunnymead Hotel enjoys an iconic Great Ocean Road location around the corner from the Aireys Inlet 'Round the Twist' lighthouse, with a host of world-class beaches on its doorstep. This Miami-inspired retreat serves up just 20 not-so-standard retro suites, along with one of the area's best new restaurants, the fragrant, Indian-inspired Santara. With a playful poolside bar serving up delicious cocktails, a swish Indie spa to soak in serenity a cosy communal fire pit and a barbeque area, Sunnymead will have you wishing for an endless summer.
offer_address: 64 Great Ocean Road, Aireys Inlet, Victoria 3230, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Miami-Inspired Great Ocean Road Relaxing Spa Retreat with A$100 Dining & A$50 Spa Credit
description: Revitalised with a vibrant colour palette and yellow Volkswagen Kombi named Daisy, a signature palette of yellow and white umbrellas framing the mineral pool and a swish Indie spa, the brand-new Sunnymead will have you feeling like summer will never end. Hidden just up the way from the iconic Aireys Inlet 'Round the Twist' lighthouse and home to one of the area's best new restaurants, Asian-fusion Santara Restaurant, this Miami-inspired motel retreat serves up just 20 not-so-standard retro suites, a fire pit to cosy by and an iconic Victorian location close to world-class beaches, snorkelling and top-notch food and wine.
offer_address: 64 Great Ocean Road, Aireys Inlet, Victoria 3230, Australia

This Miami-inspired retreat serves up just 20 not-so-standard retro suites, along with one of the area's best new restaurants, the fragrant, Indian-inspired Santara.
